name: star-time-lapse
description: Drawing a star-filled sky with time-lapse effect

scripts.umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=development browserify index.js -t envify -s StarTimeLapse -o star-time-lapse.js
scripts.umd-min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify index.js -t envify -t babelify --presets [ env react ] -s StarTimeLapse -t uglifyify -o | uglifyjs --compress unused,dead_code -o star-time-lapse.min.js
scripts.build: npm run umd && npm run umd-min
scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=development watchify index.js -t envify -s StarTimeLapse -o star-time-lapse.js

author: zoron (https://github.com/fralonra/)
